import React, { FC, useState, useEffect, useMemo, useCallback } from 'react' import styles from './news.module.css' import avatar from '../../images/png/Bitmap.png' import post from '../../images/jpg/Bitmap.jpg' import path from '../../images/svg/Path.svg' import comment from '../../images/svg/post/comment.svg' import link from '../../images/svg/link.svg' import retweet from '../../images/svg/post/retweet.svg' import like from '../../images/svg/post/like.svg' import share from '../../images/svg/post/share.svg' import statistics from '../../images/svg/post/statistics.svg' import { tweetsArr } from '../PopupTweet/PopupTweet' export const postNavSvg = [comment, retweet, like, share, statistics] export const News: FC = () => { const [arr, setArr] = useState(['test']) let a: string[] = [] useMemo(() => { a = [...tweetsArr] }, [tweetsArr]) useEffect(() => { setArr([...a]) }, [a]) return ( <>
